_comment: Templates for error messages to provide informative feedback to the user.

slack_connection_error.title: Slack Connection Error
slack_connection_error.message:
Failed to connect to Slack. Please ensure your Slack API token is valid and properly configured. Check the plugin's settings for configuration instructions.

Details: {error_details}

channel_not_found.title: Channel Not Found
channel_not_found.message:
The specified Slack channel '{channel_name}' was not found. Please verify the channel name and ensure the Slack app has access to it.

Details: {error_details}

message_posting_error.title: Message Posting Error
message_posting_error.message:
Failed to post the message to Slack. Please check the Slack API token permissions and ensure the message content is valid.

Details: {error_details}

invalid_channel_format._comment: Error when the user specifies a channel incorrectly, e.g., without a #
invalid_channel_format.title: Invalid Channel Format
invalid_channel_format.message: The Slack channel name '{channel_name}' is not in the correct format. Please ensure it starts with a '#', e.g., '#general' or '#engineering'.

web_search_failed._comment: Error to indicate that the underlying web search failed
web_search_failed.title: Web Search Failed
web_search_failed.message:
The web search failed to retrieve information. Please check your query and try again.

Details: {error_details}

formatting_error.title: Formatting Error
formatting_error.message:
An error occurred while formatting the search results for Slack. Please report this issue to the plugin developer. 

Details: {error_details}

unknown_error._comment: Generic error message for unexpected failures
unknown_error.title: Unknown Error
unknown_error.message:
An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact support with the following details: 

{error_details}

rate_limit_exceeded.title: Slack Rate Limit Exceeded
rate_limit_exceeded.message:
The Slack API rate limit has been exceeded. Please wait a few minutes and try again. Consider optimizing your usage to avoid frequent rate limiting.

Details: {error_details}

no_search_results.title: No Search Results
no_search_results.message: No relevant search results were found for your query. Please try refining your search terms.
